name: The Wizard's Apprentice
description:
As the mistreated apprentice of a curmudgeonly but mighty wizard, you dream of the day when you will ascend to your place in the Grand Wizard’s Council… You see your opportunity to increase your knowledge of the arcane when the wizard announces he’s traveling to town to procure rare ingredients for his most powerful spells.

Now’s your chance to experiment – use the magical discipline of alchemy to  join together different ingredients to create new magical compounds! Don’t get caught, and most importantly, don’t blow up the tower!

Instructions

Each potion has a certain recipe to create it. Listen to the spellbook's description, and then find the ingredients that best match the clues that the tome gives you. How many pages can you complete before the wizard returns in five minutes?
